WorkItem.ClosedComment: The TypeScript compiler doesn't support minification, this looks like a problem with the external tool you're using to minify your code, since you indicate the .js file does contain the changes.
WorkItem.Description:
0.9.1.1
I just had a situation, where compile on save had created the js file, but the minified version did not contain the changes... 

Same thing for publish, sometimes the js files do not get published at all, then I have to try compile & save several times until it works !!
WorkItem.Summary: Sometime the minified version is not updated with compile on save 0.9.1.1
